content.body: Apparently esbuild now minifies `typeof x === "undefined"` -> `typeof x>"u"`. I can't wait until this optimization results in someone's new primitive type getting rejected because it starts with e.g. `v` and makes everyone's code size bigger.
content.formatted_body: Apparently esbuild now minifies typeof x === "undefined" -> typeof x>"u". I can't wait until this optimization results in someone's new primitive type getting rejected because it starts with e.g. v and makes everyone's code size bigger.

content.body: argh, whyyyyy? It's not even shorter than `x===void 0`!
content.formatted_body: argh, whyyyyy? It's not even shorter than x===void 0!
